components.subRecipeName: Chicken Stuffed For Oriental Chicken 1 KG
reheatingSteps: Put the Vacuum bag of chicken in a hot pot
When Heated take out the chicken and Slice it 2 cm / pc
Add it on top of the Oriental Rice that's been previously heated
components.quantityControlNotes: Apply Oriental Sauce over the Slices of chicken to keep it juicy
components.presentationGuidelines: Sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon powder over the chicken and Use Fresh Rosemary and slices of lemon

reheatingSteps: Put the vacuum bag in the hot pot for 20 to 25 min if not frozen
Take out the rice from the bag and put it in the GN
components.quantityControlNotes: Prevent it from becoming mushy. Avoid applying excessive pressure or squeezing the bag
components.presentationGuidelines: The quantity of Rice should be 60% the quantity of Chicken in the GN

reheatingSteps: Take out the sauce from the vacuum bag put it on a pot, Place it on stovetop on low heat
Stir the sauce frequently until evenly heat
components.quantityControlNotes: If the sauce separates, small amount of roux (Mixture of same qty of Butter and Flour) and stir it until gradually Thicken
components.presentationGuidelines: Put the sauce in a small GN over the counter or in a separate rechaud to keep it hot

reheatingSteps: Put the vacuum bag in the hot pot for 20 to 25 min if not frozen
Take out the Kabab from the bag and put it in the GN
components.quantityControlNotes: Add Tomato Sauce at the Bottom of the GN before you put the Chicken Kabab in order to keep it juicy
components.presentationGuidelines: Try to Place the Kabab fingers in Symmetrical pattern Sprinkle Chopped Parsley on top

reheatingSteps: Cut the bun equally, paste butter inside it and put it over the grill to become light golden

components.quantityControlNotes: Clean and Sanitize, Make sure its fresh and firm

reheatingSteps: Preheat the Grill - light brush the grill with oil to prevent sticking
if the meat is 2 cm Thickness it needs between 6 to 7 min over the grill
Close the patties with lid for even cooking
components.quantityControlNotes: Flip only once using spatula - Avoid pressing down on the patty (This squeezes out the juices)

reheatingSteps: Put over the Grilled meat until it melts (30 to 60 seconds before removing the patties)
Mash the avocado, add finely chopped onions, tomatoes and coriander then add lemon juice and salt (Follow the recipe on odoo)
components.quantityControlNotes: Make sure the ingredients are fresh

components.presentationGuidelines: Slice the tomatoes to match the diameter of the burger patty and bun, ensuring a consistent size for even distribution

reheatingSteps: Take out the sauce from the vacuum bag put it on a pot, Place it on stovetop on low heat
Stir the sauce frequently until evenly heat
Boil the water in a large pot, Add salt to enhance the pasta's Flavor
Add the pasta to the boiling salty water Stir immediately to prevent sticking
components.quantityControlNotes: Stir Occasionally to ensure even cooking - Do Not Rinse the pasta. Add a bit of olive oil to prevent sticking if you are not going to mix it up with sauce
components.presentationGuidelines: Use Fresh Basil Leaves for Decoration

reheatingSteps: Sprinkle the Shredded Mozzarella Directly over the GN while still hot
Put the vacuum bag in the hot pot for 20 to 25 min if not frozen
Take out the rice from the bag and put it in the GN
components.quantityControlNotes: Prevent it from becoming mushy. Avoid applying excessive pressure or squeezing the bag
components.presentationGuidelines: Use Simple Garnish like Chopped Parsley

reheatingSteps: Remove the mashed potatoes from the bag and transfer them to a large pot over low heat, stirring constantly to prevent sticking.
components.quantityControlNotes: If the mashed potatoes are too thick and need to be loosened, add hot milk gradually while stirring continuously over low heat.
